system.description:
The knock spell opens stuck, barred, or locked doors, gates, chests, and so forth.

  • Magically held doors: Are affected (e.g. @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.tT8UpDyql4hLraCF]{hold portal}, @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.To5RLzNSZTEXtZk6]{wizard lock}).

  • Secret doors: May be opened, but they must be known to the caster.
